keywords.title: Keywords/Tags
keywords.description: Keywords (search phrases) to search through (tags are also supported).

langCode.title: Language code
langCode.description: The language code to be used in the query for filtration of the servers. Uses ISO 639-1 standard.

startPageNumber.title: Starting page number
startPageNumber.description: The page at which the scraper should start. Allowed range is from 1 to 50.

endPageNumber.title: Ending page number
endPageNumber.description: The page at which the scraper should end. Allowed range is from 1 to 50. Should be larger than or equal to Starting page number.

scrapeReviews.title: Scrape reviews
scrapeReviews.description: Whether to go through all reviews of the found servers. Will take up more requests and take longer to complete.
